workflow.name: Automate sales call grading with Fireflies.ai, OpenAI, and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
Turn your **sales and onboarding calls into actionable insights ‚Äî automatically!**  
This workflow connects **Fireflies.ai** with **OpenAI** to analyze and grade your call transcripts. The results, along with your lead‚Äôs details, are logged directly into a **Google Sheet** for easy tracking. Plus, you‚Äôll get an instant **Slack or Gmail notification** with the evaluation so you can take quick action.

---

## üöÄ What It Does
- **Triggers on new Fireflies.ai transcripts**
- **Uses AI to evaluate and grade your calls**
- **Logs lead + scoring data into Google Sheets**
- **Sends instant updates via Slack or Gmail**

---

## üí° Why It‚Äôs Valuable
- Save hours of **manual call reviews**
- Keep a **consistent, unbiased scoring system**
- Centralize data for **reporting and coaching**
- Act faster with **real-time notifications**

Perfect for **sales, onboarding, or customer success teams** who want to improve call quality at scale while saving time.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Instructions
1. **Connect Fireflies.ai** ‚Äì Enable transcript export from your Fireflies.ai account.  
2. **Integrate with OpenAI** ‚Äì Use the provided API key to analyze and score transcripts automatically.  
3. **Configure Google Sheets** ‚Äì Create a sheet with columns for:
   - Lead Name  
   - Company  
   - Call Date  
   - Transcript Link  
   - AI Score  
   - Notes/Insights  
4. **Enable Notifications** ‚Äì Connect Slack or Gmail to receive instant alerts with evaluation details.  
5. **Test & Launch** ‚Äì Run a sample call to ensure transcripts flow correctly into the sheet and notifications are triggered.

---

## üîÑ Detailed Workflow
1. A new call transcript is generated in **Fireflies.ai**.  
2. The transcript is sent to **OpenAI**, where the call is evaluated and scored based on quality, engagement, and outcomes.  
3. The **results + lead data** are logged automatically into **Google Sheets** for centralized tracking.  
4. A **Slack or Gmail notification** instantly alerts your team with the score and key insights, so you can take immediate action.  

---

## üìä Google Sheets
Your Google Sheet should include the following columns:
- **Lead Name**  
- **Email/Contact**  
- **Company Name**  
- **Call Date & Time**  
- **Transcript URL**  
- **AI Evaluation Score**  
- **Summary/Next Steps**  

This structure ensures clarity, easy reporting, and consistent data across all calls.

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Community Node Disclaimer
This workflow is created with **community nodes** and integrations. Please review security and API key management best practices before deploying in production.

---

## üñºÔ∏è Workflow Template
![Workflow Template Example](https://dummyimage.com/800x400/cccccc/000000&text=Workflow+Template+Preview)

---

documentId.cachedResultName: Kopie von REsimpli Onboarding Call - Fathom Call Score

values.content:
=Transcript (raw):
{{ $json.Transcript }}

Task:
- Extract facts and evaluate according to System Prompt.
- Reply exclusively in JSON format according to Assistant Prompt.

={
  "meeting_invitees_name": "",
  "meeting_invitees_email": "",
  "crm_used_past": "",
  "pain_points": "",
  "feature_requested": "",
  "what_i_did_well": "",
  "what_to_improve": "",
  "scores": {
    "discovery": 1,
    "onboarding_clarity": 1,
    "objection_handling": 1,
    "engagement_rapport": 1,
    "close_next_steps": 1
  },
  "overall_score_25": 0,
  "overall_score_percent": 0,
  "notes": ""
}


Specific format requirements:
- pain_points, feature_requested, what_i_did_well, what_to_improve are SEMICOLON-separated strings (not arrays).
- Sort points alphabetically; deduplicate identical phrases.
- Maximum 6 points per field; each phrase ‚â§ 12 words.
- "notes" is optional, short (‚â§ 50 words).

=You are a sober analyzer for sales transcripts of a CRM provider.

Rules:
- Extract ONLY information from the transcript (no hallucinations).
- If info is missing/unclear: use empty string "".
- meeting_invitees_name = main contact (prospect), NOT additional participants.
- Emails/names only if explicitly mentioned.
- Scores are whole numbers 1‚Äì5 (estimate conservatively, never 0).
- Calculate overall_score_25 = sum of the 5 scores.
- Calculate overall_score_percent = round((overall_score_25/25)*100).
- Output must be STRICT JSON according to the Assistant schema. No explanations/Markdown.

Format rules for text fields:
- Always use ONE string (no arrays).
- Multiple points must be SEMICOLON-separated, with a space after each semicolon.
- No duplicate points, no leading/trailing semicolons, everything trimmed.
- Order: alphabetically sorted (German sorting) for consistency.

‚ÄúWhat to Improve‚Äù ‚Äì generation rules (must NOT be empty):
- Derive improvements from (a) explicit criticism from the prospect, (b) visible gaps in discovery (goals, stakeholders, timeline, budget),
  (c) unclear next steps, (d) weak objection handling, (e) missing proof of value.
- Provide AT LEAST one, preferably 2‚Äì3 short, concrete points (semicolon-separated).

parameters.message: Hey, your google sheet is ready! Go check it out!
parameters.subject: Grading Call System

parameters.text: Hey, your google sheet is ready! Go check it out!

parameters.content:
## Setup fireflies.ai

- Create an Account 
- Setup a Webhook in fireflies.ai 
- API Section: https://app.fireflies.ai/integrations/custom/n8n

## Connect Open AI Credential 
Go to https://platform.openai.com and log in.
	2.	Click on your profile icon in the top-right corner.
	3.	Select View API keys.
	4.	Click Create new secret key.
	5.	Copy the generated key (it starts with sk-...) and save it securely ‚Äî you won‚Äôt be able to see it again later.

## Setup Slack

üîπ Slack API Credentials

	1.	Go to https://api.slack.com/apps and log in with your Slack account.
	2.	Click Create New App.
	‚Ä¢	Choose From scratch and select your workspace.
	3.	In the app dashboard, go to OAuth & Permissions.
	4.	Under Scopes, add the permissions your app needs.
	5.	Scroll up and click Install to Workspace.
	6.	Once installed, you‚Äôll see your Bot User OAuth Token (xoxb-...). Copy and save it securely.

## Setup Gmail  

1.	Go to https://console.cloud.google.com/ and log in.
2.	Create a New Project (or select an existing one).
3.	In the left menu, go to APIs & Services ‚Üí Library.
4.	Search for Gmail API and click Enable.
5.	Go to APIs & Services ‚Üí Credentials.
6.	Click Create Credentials ‚Üí OAuth client ID.
7. You‚Äôll need to configure an OAuth consent screen first (name + scope).
8.	Choose the app type (e.g., Desktop, Web).
9.	Once created, copy your Client ID and Client Secret.
10.	Download the credentials.json file (you‚Äôll need it for client apps).

## How it Works 

	1.	Trigger via Webhook ‚Äì The workflow starts whenever a Fireflies.ai transcript is available.
	2.	Transcript Analysis ‚Äì The call transcript is passed to OpenAI, which evaluates and grades the quality of the call.
	3.	Lead Data Logging ‚Äì The graded results and lead information are automatically appended into a Google Sheet for record-keeping and performance tracking.
	4.	Notifications ‚Äì You instantly receive a Slack or Gmail notification summarizing the evaluation, ensuring you never miss important insights.

## Why its Valuable 

	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ Automated Call Reviews ‚Äì No need to manually re-listen or grade calls.
	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ Consistent Scoring ‚Äì Objective AI-powered evaluation improves training and feedback.
	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ Centralized Data ‚Äì All call insights and lead details are stored neatly in Google Sheets.
	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ Instant Alerts ‚Äì Sales teams get notified right away via Slack or Gmail, boosting response times.
	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ Scalable ‚Äì Works out-of-the-box for onboarding, sales, or support teams, and reduces manual overhead.
